snippet.title: Super Mario 64 Maker V1.3 Release (MAJOR LAG REDUCTIONS)
snippet.description:
For more fangames, subscribe to this channel!
Almost all the bugs are gone! New features included.
Lag reduction, a copy and paste functionality, slight movement, all included.

Download:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XNZk4ggJkcc

Changelog:
V1.1: added an option to hold L while pressing A to slightly move the object. reduced lag from solid objects significantly.
V1.1b: bully star now spawns properly.. reversed the lag reduction from before for technical reasons.
V1.2:- you can now copy/paste objects
- collision lags way less
- enemy star + boss star spawn crash removed
- some bosses are now available
- cam wont screw up when collecting an underwater star
- you cant kill camera when pause exeting from canons and quicksand deaths anymore
V1.2b: fixed a bug that would attach a random object to mario sometimes.
V1.2c: removed a null pointer exception with the copypaste function
V1.3: low solidity option when holding l when exiting out of object menu
fixed a koopa glitch
fixed a VSC glitch
